definition: fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]
banana person (yellow outside, white inside)/mildly pejorative term used by Chinese for assimilated Asian Americans/Westernized person of Asian appearance

sentences.english: But this kind of catabolism mainly concentrates on the banana skin.
sentences.chinese: 而这种分解代谢主要集中在香蕉皮上。

sentences.english: My mother was wrapping some banana fritters for a customer.
sentences.chinese: 我母亲当时正在为一位顾客包香蕉煎饼。

sentences.english: The three children ran to the bananas tree for breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 这三个孩子跑到香蕉树旁，把香蕉作为早餐。

sentences.english: The three children ran to the bananas tree for breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 这三个孩子跑到香蕉树旁，把香蕉作为早餐。

sentences.english: No wonder the banana is the number one fruit with the world\\\'s leading athletes.
sentences.chinese: 怪不得香蕉能够成为世界顶级运动员的首选水果。

sentences.english: He gave the monkey a banana to eat.
sentences.chinese: 他拿了一根香蕉给那猴子吃。

sentences.english: You slip on the banana skin.
sentences.chinese: 你被你的香蕉皮滑到了。

sentences.english: No, though even here, the growers put plastic bags around the bunches to protect them and keep them warm.
sentences.chinese: 不，甚至在这种植者用塑料袋围住香蕉树使它们包暖。

sentences.english: The picture above is banana with cow organs.
sentences.chinese: 图片中呈现的则是香蕉与牛杂。

sentences.english: But energy isn\\\'t the only way a banana can help us keep fit.
sentences.chinese: 但能源并非是香蕉帮助我们强身健体的唯一途径。

sentences.english: Bananas are scarce, not to mention mangos.
sentences.chinese: 香蕉已下市了，更不用说芒果了。

sentences.english: The skin of bananas is yellow.
The technique turns the banana peel carbon into electricity.
sentences.chinese: 这种技术将香蕉皮中的碳转化成电能。

sentences.english: A country like Norway could produce bananas in hothouse.
sentences.chinese: 象挪威那样的国家，在温室中也能种植香蕉。

sentences.english: Bananas are nutritious so they're the perfect no-fuss snack.
sentences.chinese: 香蕉营养丰富，称它为绝美小吃也不为过。

sentences.english: The banana bears two crops every year.

definition: red pitaya/dragon fruit/dragon pearl fruit (genus Hylocereus)
Hami melon (a variety of muskmelon)/honeydew melon/cantaloupe
